info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 30 at 6:19AM EDT until October 31 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Warning, one to two feet of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding.
* WHERE...Shoreline in Charles and King George Counties.
* WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Warning, until noon EDT today, especially around the time of high tide. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, from noon today to 2 AM EDT Friday, especially around the time of high tide.
* IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, water covers yards and roads in Dahlgren and on Cobb Island. Water covers the approach to Cobb Island bridge and begins limiting the ability to reach the mainland. Also water approaches structures near Cobb Island.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides up to 3 feet above normal. The next high tides at Goose Bay are 11:01 AM and 11:24 PM. The next high tides at Dahlgren are 9:37 AM and 10:06 PM. The next high tides at Indian Head are 2:55 PM and 3:18 AM.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.

parameter.value: COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 2 AM EDT FRIDAY
